text:
Hello, could somebody please help me:
I created myself a developper account to stage my work. So now I have access to my company account and my dev account.
On my local environnement, using the CLI I used `hs init` to generate my config file and credential. It opened the "personnal key" page on my company account, I used it to generate my config file.
Next I *wanted to add my developper account in the config file*, I used `hs auth`, but *it always open the "personnal key" page for my company account*, even if I previously switched to my dev account. So I cannot generate my access key for my dev account.
What I am missing?
